resources.string: KanBan
Hello blank fragment
Select * from [leltar].[dbo].Leltaradat
SELECT LeltarKuty_Jog as Jog FROM [Fusetech].[dbo].Jogok WHERE Pecset = ?

SELECT WarehouseID, BinNumber, InternalName, BinDescript2 FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC360300_StockBinNo left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC230300_WarehouseInfo ON WarehouseID = Warehouse where WarehouseID = \'02\' and BinNumber = ?

SELECT WarehouseID, BinNumber, InternalName, BinDescript2 FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC360300_StockBinNo left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC230300_WarehouseInfo ON WarehouseID = Warehouse where BinNumber = ?

SELECT SC33001 as [StockItem],SUM(SC33005) as [BalanceQty],SUM(SC33008) as [ReceivedQty],MAX(VF_SY240300_QTCategory.TextDescription) as QcCategory,MAX([SC01002]) as Description1,MAX([SC01003]) as Description2,MAX([SC01093]) as IntRem,MAX([SC01094]) as IntRem2,rtrim(MAX([Description])) as Unit ,MAX(WarehouseID)as WarehouseID,MAX(InternalName)as Warehouse FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC360300_StockBinNo] left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC330300 on BinNumber = SC33004 left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[SC010300] on SC33001 = SC01001 left join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] on SC01133 = UnitCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SY240300_QTCategory ON SC33038 = VF_SY240300_QTCategory.Key1 left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC230300_WarehouseInfo as wi ON wi.Warehouse = WarehouseID where SC33005 > 0 and BinNumber= ? group by SC33001, SC33010, SC33038

SELECT SUM(SC33005) as [BalanceQty], MAX([SC33004])as BinNumber,MAX([ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC230300.SC23002) AS Warehouse, MAX(VF_SY240300_QTCategory.TextDescription) as QcCategory, MAX([SC01002]) as Description1, MAX([SC01003]) as Description2, MAX([SC01093]) as IntRem, MAX([Description]) as Unit, SC33001 as [StockItem] FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC360300_StockBinNo] left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC330300 on BinNumber = SC33004 left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[SC010300] on SC33001 = SC01001 left join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] on SC01133 = UnitCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC230300 ON [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC230300.SC23001 = [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC330300.SC33002 LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SY240300_QTCategory ON SC33038 = VF_SY240300_QTCategory.Key1 where SC33005 > 0 and SC33001= ? group by SC33001, SC33004, SC33010, case when isnull(SC33038,\'\')=\'\' then \'00\' else SC33038 end";

SELECT SC33001 AS StockItem, (SC33004) AS BinNumber,MIN(SC33013) AS Date, SUM(SC33005) AS BalanceQty, SUM(SC33006) AS AllocQty, SUM(SC33007) AS OrderedQty, SUM(SC33008) AS ReceivedQty FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC330300 WITH (nolock) WHERE SC33001 = ? AND (SC33002 = \'02\') AND (SC33005 > 0) AND (SC33004 <> \'\') AND (LEFT(SC33001, 1) <> \'N\') GROUP BY SC33001,SC33004 ORDER BY Date

SELECT [StockItem],[BalanceQty],[QCCategory],SC01.Description1,SC01.Description2,SC01.InternRem1,SCU.Description FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC330300_StockBatch_Tranzit_Szabad] as SC33 left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC010300_Stockfile] as SC01 on SC33.StockItem = SC01.StockCode left join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] as SCU on SC01.UnitCodeStoc = SCU.UnitCode WHERE StockItem= ? AND BalanceQty <> 0 AND left(SC33.StockItem,1) < > \'N\'

SELECT WarehouseID, BinNumber, InternalName FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC360300_StockBinNo left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC230300_WarehouseInfo ON WarehouseID = Warehouse Where BinNumber = ? and WarehouseID = \'01\'
SELECT id,kontener,termeles_rakhely FROM [leltar].[dbo].kontener where atado = ? and statusz = ?
INSERT INTO [leltar].[dbo].kontener (atado,statusz,kontener_tipus,termeles_raktar) Values(?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO [leltar].[dbo].kontener_tetel (kontener_id,cikkszam,statusz,igenyelt_mennyiseg,mozgatott_mennyiseg,termeles_raktar,termeles_rakhely,igenyelt_mennyiseg_egyseg) Values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].kontener SET kontener = ? where atado = ? and statusz = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].kontener SET termeles_rakhely = ? where atado = ? and statusz = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET statusz = 1 where kontener_id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] SET statusz = ?, SzallitoJarmu = ?, atvevo = ? where id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].kontener SET statusz = ?, igenyelve = ? where id = ?

SELECT cikkszam, igenyelt_mennyiseg,cikk.[SC01002] as megjegyzes FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].SC010300 as cikk on cikk.SC01001 = [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel].cikkszam where kontener_id = ? order by id desc

SELECT MAX(kontener.id)as id,MAX(kontener.kontener)as kontener,MAX(kontener.statusz) as statusz,MAX(kontener.igenyelve)as igenyelve,COUNT(tetel.kontener_id)as tetelszam, MAX(kontener.termeles_rakhely)as polc FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] as kontener LEFT OUTER JOIN [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel ON kontener.id = tetel.kontener_id WHERE kontener.statusz = 0 and kontener.KanbanStatus = 1 GROUP BY kontener.id

SELECT tetel.id as id, tetel.kontener_id as kontener_id,tetel.cikkszam as cikkszam,adat.Description1 ,adat.Description2 ,adat.InternRem1 ,tetel.statusz as statusz, tetel.igenyelt_mennyiseg as igenyelt_mennyiseg ,tetel.mozgatott_mennyiseg as mozgatott_mennyiseg, unit.Description as Unit FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC010300_Stockfile] as adat ON tetel.cikkszam = adat.StockCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] as unit ON adat.UnitCodeStoc = unit.UnitCode where kontener_id = ? and statusz < 3 AND (atvevo IS NULL OR atvevo = ?)

SELECT MAX(kontener.id)as id,MAX(kontener.kontener)as kontener,MAX(kontener.igenyelve)as igenyelve,MAX(kontener.statusz) as statusz,COUNT(tetel.kontener_id)as tetelszam, MAX(kontener.termeles_rakhely)as polc FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] as kontener LEFT OUTER JOIN [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel ON kontener.id = tetel.kontener_id WHERE kontener.statusz = 1 OR kontener.statusz = 2 GROUP BY kontener.id ORDER BY igenyelve,tetelszam desc

SELECT tetel.id as id, tetel.cikkszam as cikkszam, adat.Description1 ,adat.Description2 ,adat.InternRem1 ,tetel.statusz as statusz, tetel.igenyelt_mennyiseg as igenyelt_mennyiseg ,tetel.mozgatott_mennyiseg as mozgatott_mennyiseg, unit.Description as Unit, tetel.kontener_id as kontener_id FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC010300_Stockfile] as adat ON tetel.cikkszam = adat.StockCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] as unit ON adat.UnitCodeStoc = unit.UnitCode where kontener_id = ? and statusz = ?
SELECT id FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] where id = ? and statusz = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].kontener SET atvevo = ? where id = ?

SELECT WarehouseID, BinNumber, InternalName FROM [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC360300_StockBinNo left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].VF_SC230300_WarehouseInfo ON WarehouseID = Warehouse WHERE WarehouseID = ? AND BinNumber = ?
SELECT [id] FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] WHERE id = ? AND statusz < 3 AND atvevo IS NULL OR atvevo = ?
SELECT [id],[atvevo] FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] WHERE id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET statusz = ?, atvevo = ? where id = ?
SELECT id, kontener_tetel_id,mozgatott_mennyiseg,kiado_raktar,kiado_rakhely FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_raktar_tetel] where kontener_tetel_id = ?

SELECT tetel.id as id, tetel.kontener_id as kontener_id,tetel.cikkszam as cikkszam,adat.Description1 ,adat.Description2 ,adat.InternRem1 ,tetel.statusz as statusz, tetel.igenyelt_mennyiseg as igenyelt_mennyiseg ,tetel.mozgatott_mennyiseg as mozgatott_mennyiseg, unit.Description as Unit FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC010300_Stockfile] as adat ON tetel.cikkszam = adat.StockCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] as unit ON adat.UnitCodeStoc = unit.UnitCode where kontener_id = ?
SELECT [TextDescription] FROM [Fusetech].[dbo].[DolgKodok] where Key1 = ?
INSERT INTO [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_raktar_tetel] (kontener_tetel_id,mozgatott_mennyiseg,kiado_raktar,kiado_rakhely) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
SELECT [id] FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] where kontener_id= ? AND statusz <> 3
SELECT SUM(mozgatott_mennyiseg) as mozgatott_mennyiseg FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_raktar_tetel] where kontener_tetel_id = ?
SELECT SzallitoJarmu FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] WHERE id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET mozgatott_mennyiseg = ?, kiado_raktar = ?, kiado_rakhely = ?, SzallitoJarmu = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET statusz = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET atvevo = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT SUM ([mozgatott_mennyiseg])as mozgatott_mennyiseg, [kiado_rakhely] FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_raktar_tetel] WHERE kontener_tetel_id = ? GROUP BY kiado_rakhely

SELECT [id],[atado],[atvevo],[kontener],[kontener_tipus],[statusz],[igenyelve],[osszegyujtve],[kihelyezve],[termeles_raktar],[termeles_rakhely],[KanbanStatus],[SzallitoJarmu],info.BinDescript2 FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] left outer join [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC360300_StockBinNo] as info ON SzallitoJarmu = info.BinNumber where id = ?
DELETE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_raktar_tetel] WHERE kontener_tetel_id = ?
SELECT [termeles_rakhely] FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] where statusz = 3 AND SzallitoJarmu = ? GROUP BY termeles_rakhely

SELECT tetel.id as id, tetel.kontener_id as kontener_id, tetel.cikkszam as cikkszam, adat.Description1, adat.Description2, adat.InternRem1, tetel.statusz as statusz, tetel.igenyelt_mennyiseg as igenyelt_mennyiseg, tetel.mozgatott_mennyiseg as mozgatott_mennyiseg, fej.termeles_rakhely as kiszallitas, unit.Description as Unit FROM [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] as tetel LEFT OUTER JOIN [leltar].[dbo].[kontener]as fej on tetel.kontener_id = fej.id LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SC010300_Stockfile] as adat ON tetel.cikkszam = adat.StockCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [ScaCompDB].[dbo].[VF_SCUN0300_UnitCode] as unit ON adat.UnitCodeStoc = unit.UnitCode where fej.termeles_rakhely = ? and fej.statusz = 3
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener] SET kihelyezve = ?, statusz = 5 WHERE id = ?
UPDATE [leltar].[dbo].[kontener_tetel] SET statusz = 5 WHERE id = ?
